component.name: Ultimate Mail for Mobile
component.summary: Easily download and manage mails and folders on IMAP4 and POP3 servers as well as compose send email messages

sample.name: iOS Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to compose a mail message and send it on iOS.

sample.name: iOS Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to connect to an IMAP server and show the mailbox stat on iOS.

sample.name: iOS Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to connect to a POP3 server and show the mailbox stat on iOS.

sample.name: Android Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to compose a mail message and send it on Android.

sample.name: Android Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to connect to an IMAP server and show the mailbox stat on Android.

sample.name: Android Sample.
sample.summary: Demonstrates How to connect to a POP3 server and show the mailbox stat on Android.
